1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Starting with the beginning of the Premier League in 1992, this programme covers the best goals through to 1995. Watch the class of Teddy Sheringham and Matt Le Tissier as he twisted and turned to lose three Blackburn defenders before unleashing a monstrous drive that flew in to the top corner and many more.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Relive fantastic goals scored between 1995-1998 from Premier League legends including Fowler, Ferdinand and Shearer, who was the league's top scorer following his transfer to his hometown club Newcastle in 1997. Plus 1997-98 brought about the emergence of a certain 18-year-old striker Michael Owen for Liverpool..

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: This programme covers magnificent goals from between 1998-2001 from some of the finest and most skilled players in the Premier League. Watch West Ham United star, Paolo Di Canio's superb half volley slam into the back of the net in the 1999-2000 season along with breathtaking strikes from the Premier League's greatest players.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: This programme reflects the seasons of 2001-2003. Including a memorable strike from Dennis Bergkamp in who defied footballing physics with a deft touch with his left boot that spun the ball round the bamboozled defender, as the Dutchman vied right and scored. See goals from Zola, Scholes and Owen in the fight for the 2002-03 title.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: A plethora of stunning goals from various teams in the Premier League competing for the title across two seasons during 2003-2005, including Wayne Rooney, now at Manchester United, unleashing unbelievable power onto a dropping ball, slamming it into the Newcastle United goal from 35 yards away.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: This programme reflects on an eclectic mix of masterful goals over two seasons during 2005-2007. Examples of fantastic goals are shown here including one from, Paul Scholes, a true star in Premier League history, as he sent a thunderous volley into the Aston Villa goal during 2006-07 Season.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: This programme highlights some of the inspiring and tremendous goals throughout the seasons during 2007-2009. Remind yourself of the glorious spectacle of David Bentley's 43 yard dipping goal against his old club Arsenal, plus many more mesmerising strikes hitting the back of the net.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Refresh your memory with the most recent brilliance that has taken place in the Premier League, during 2009-2011. From Maynor Figueroa?s goal from his own half against Stoke City through to Rooney's spectacular bicycle kick against Manchester City, plus many more.

imdb.plot outline: A fantastic opportunity to watch The Greatest Goals scored during the history of The Premier League, including stunning and significant goals from the most exciting league in the World. Spectacular goals, accompanied by interviews with greats such as Thierry Henry, Matt Le Tissier, Alan Shearer, Dennis Berkgamp and many others.
imdb.title: Premier League Greatest Goals
